welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Sugar Hill! Get ready to be charmed by this picturesque city known for its stunning views and friendly community. We invite you to explore and soak up all the beauty and charm Sugar Hill has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gwinnett County Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including dining options, retail stores, and rental car services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Gwinnett County Airport caters to private and corporate aircraft, providing luxurious amenities and services for a seamless travel experience.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lee Gilmer Memorial Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Lee Gilmer Memorial Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dekalb-Peachtree Airport serves commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Dekalb-Peachtree Airport is dedicated to private and corporate flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Dekalb-Peachtree Airport is primarily used for flight training and general aviation.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Canton Cherokee County Regional Airport houses all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Canton Cherokee County Regional Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
